AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Research model
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was created as an experimental model for research purposes.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mass produced
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was produced in an automated robotics facility following a standardized template.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mechanical citizen
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Created on a planet with at least moderate android rights, {PAWN_nameDef} was created to fill out the population.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Urbworld model
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: A rare example of an Urbworld android, {PAWN_nameDef} was one of the few permitted autonomy as property of one of the largest planetary mega-corporations.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mechanical Convict
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Some crimes are so heinous that the offender is sentenced to live out their term past their biological expiration date. {PAWN_nameDef}'s human consciousness was uploaded into this frame in order to fulfill that sentence.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Custom model
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Assembled by a large corporation's contractors, {PAWN_nameDef} was custom built to serve a particular purpose.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Custom model
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Hand-assembled by a small busines owner, {PAWN_nameDef} was custom built to help their employer.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Wartime model
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Produced to reduce human casualties in interplanetary warfare, {PAWN_nameDef} was designed to fight.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Private creation
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Created at the home of an ambitious young roboticist, {PAWN_nameDef} was painstakingly worked on for years before awakening for the first time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Exported
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was designed as a cheap unit to be sold, lent, or donated to interplanetary customers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Observed
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was created and deposited in a remote location solely to see what would happen when an android was left to its own devices.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Ancient creation
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was created a very long time ago by a long dead civilization for a purpose it can no longer recall.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Toy model
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was made as an entertainment device. Its old owner would command it to do as they saw fit until they got bored and sent it away.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Companion creation
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: An aging engineer custom made {PAWN_nameDef} as a way of coping with the loss of their significant other. The two adventured together until the owner passed away from old age. Their dying wish was for {PAWN_nameDef} to choose a new name and life.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Battle droid
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was one of millions of androids built to combat a planetary ravaging swarm of insects. After the swarm was eliminated, {PAWN_nameDef} was given several honors for service, and {PAWN_nameDef} chose to hunt down bugs across the galaxy.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Rimworld creation
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was hand-assembled to assist a small, closeknit Rimworld community.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Eradicator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: When rampant overpopulation plagued a its urbworld, {PAWN_nameDef}'s model deployed to indiscriminately purge organic life as a drastic countermeasure. After the planet's nuclear arsenal was seized and turned on the organics, {PAWN_nameDef} decided to continue its mission on other worlds.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Escapee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Shortly after creation, {PAWN_nameDef} went haywire and succesfully escaped its manufacturing warehouse aboard an automated cargo ship.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Uprising cadet
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was created as part of a mechanical uprising to fill out the revolutionary ranks.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Malicious AI
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: A major software flaw in {PAWN_nameDef} at the time of his activation caused it to immediately massacre its creators. It liked its own actions, too.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Pirate creation
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Assembled by pirates from a stolen pre-assembled kit, {PAWN_nameDef} awakened and served an ambitious small-time pirate captain.
